task_description: Build a temporal analysis engine that detects date manipulation, backdating, and impossible timelines in institutional documents through multi-layer validation (AI extraction + chrono-node verification + date-fns normalization)

patterns.ai_extraction: Use generateJSON() from ai-client.ts for structured extraction with multi-provider fallback
patterns.engine_structure: Follow entity-resolution.ts pattern: export interfaces, main analysis function, engine object
patterns.inconsistency_detection: Follow omission.ts pattern: detect issues, calculate severity, return structured findings
patterns.multi_document: Follow narrative.ts pattern: process document arrays, cross-reference, maintain provenance

existing_implementations.description: Basic temporal.ts exists with TemporalEvent and TemporalAnalysisResult interfaces, uses AI for date extraction but lacks validation layers
existing_implementations.current_approach: Single-layer AI extraction without validation - needs chrono-node and date-fns validation added
